content: The water felt warmer on the northern beach compared to the one we visited on the south. We also liked that it had sand so Leo could play with a bucket and spade for the first time. Leo and Alexander had great fun filling buckets and digging holes.
Each building on the promenade seemed to have its own small stretch of loungers. Cactus bar was a good option because the loungers were free for customers and they sold tasty beer.
In June it was still very warm at 5pm and you could easily sit until the sun went down without it becoming cold.
